title: 逆转生与死，只要换种方式
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

++++ “If they are not real？”

++++++ “如果他们不像实际上那样？”

++++ "That's impossible. Reality can't be reversed. But in a different form..."
++++++ “那不可能。现实不可能被逆转。不过如果换种方式……”
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

+ “Reversing the reality， if we want to.”
++ “逆转生与死，如果我们想。”
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

+++++ “And then the sun went out.”
++++++ “然后太阳熄灭了。”
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/seventimer/sun.png]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

+++++ “At this point, all contacts have been removed, with the future, and the past. A black sword solves everything.”
++++++ “在这时，所有与他的联系被切断了，与未来的，与过去的。一把黑色的剑解决了一切。”
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/seventimer/hand.png]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

+++++ “His friend did not leave him.”
+++++ “他的朋友没有离开他。”
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/seventimer/kon.png ]]
author: SevenA
